title: Unemployment in Argentina rises to 7.9%, the highest in four years
description:
Unemployment in Argentina rose to 7.9% in the first quarter of 2025, according to a report published on Thursday by the government’s statistics institute, known as the INDEC.

This is the highest registered figure since the second quarter of 2021, when the country was still recovering from the effec...

title: Argentina: unemployment hits record figures
description:
Argentina: unemployment hits record figures

20th Friday, June 2025 - 09:07 UTC Full article

Unemployment grew 0.2% yoy in Q1 of 2025

Argentina's unemployment rate rose to 7.9% in Q1 2025, the highest since Q3 2021, up 0.2% from Q1 2024 and 1.5% from Q4 2024, according to a report from the Nationa...
